mapper.select: select p.packageNum, p.sellerNum, p.packageName, s.sellerNum, s.storeName, po.userNum, po.pkTotalPrice, po.orderedAt, po.deleveryStatus from packageOrder po Join package p on po.packageNum = p.packageNum Join sellerdetail s on p.sellerNum = s.sellerNum where po.userNum = #{userNum} order by po.orderedAt desc
